txt.en: 'Hey, you there! That was six beers -- why are you still drinking?'
'Really now, I think you have had quite enough already. Twelve beers? I never....'
'Eighteen beers! I have seen enthusiasts in plenty, but never one so selfish! Stop that.'
'I apologize, good Inn League folks. Hopefully we will not encounter any more interruptions today. Twenty-four beers....'
'Well done -- and now you must visit the Taste of Hobbiton! Go north from here, to the Hill.'
